ValidationRule.description: This validation Rule was created as part of the SFDC-17225
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(OpportunityId)), ISCHANGED(Status), TEXT(Opportunity.Business_Group__c) = 'Core', $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Customer Services', OR( (NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity.Reseller__c))&& ISBLANK(Opportunity.Reseller__r.Partner_Number__c)), (NOT(ISBLANK(Opportunity.Distributor__c))&& ISBLANK(Opportunity.Distributor__r.Partner_Number__c))), OR(TEXT(Status)= 'Activated', TEXT(Status)= 'Placed'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This order cannot be placed because the Partner Number is missing from either the Partner Account or the Distributor account. Please fill out the missing Partner Number to proceed.
